CustomField.formula: IF(ISNUMBER(Left(Text(Prospect_Status__c),1)), Case(Value(Left(Text(Prospect_Status__c),1)) - Value(Left(Text(Buying_Process__c),1)), 0,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asS&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558760000', 'Aligned') + ' Aligned', 1,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Selling +1', 2,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Selling +2', 3,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Selling +3', 4,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Selling +4', -1,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Buying +1', -2,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Buying +2', -3,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Buying +3', -4,IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' Misaligned - Buying +4', 'Select Something'), IF(TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)='Lost to Competitor', IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asX&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558784000', 'Misaligned') + ' ' + TEXT(Prospect_Status__c), IF(TEXT(Prospect_Status__c)='Subscriber', IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000021asS&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1460558760000', 'Subscriber') + ' ' + TEXT(Prospect_Status__c), TEXT(Prospect_Status__c))))
CustomField.label: Selling/Buying Process Alignment
